headline: Ask HN: Which companies offer surrogacy assistance programs?
description:
I recently found that Adobe offers a Surrogacy Assistance Program[1] for employees in the U.S.

This was the first time I'd heard of such an employee benefit. I Googled around a little and this doesn't seem to be such a broadly offered employment benefit, so I'm interested to learn if a company you currently work at or have previously worked at offers something similar.

In particular, I'd be interested to learn how "employee-friendly" such programs and benefits are in practice.

[1]: https://benefits.adobe.com/document/201
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 哪些公司提供代孕援助计划？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 哪些公司提供代孕援助計劃？

我最近发现，Adobe公司为美国的员工提供了一个代孕援助计划[1]。

特别是，我有兴趣了解这种计划和福利在实践中是如何"员工友好"的。

[1] ：https://benefits.adobe.com/document/201
